response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be equally beneficial to you. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000, a significant discount from its original valuation of $1,200,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our commitment to finding the perfect owner for such a remarkable piece. We trust that you will appreciate the unique qualities and potential of this product. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
